plugin.name: Rails 2.3.x Maven Mojo
plugin.description: aggregation project for various jruby related maven plugins

mojo.description: Goal to unpack all gems and its dependencies

parameter.name: artifacts
parameter.description: The project's artifacts.

parameter.name: classRealm
parameter.description: classrealm for internal use.

parameter.name: fork
parameter.description: fork the JRuby execution.

parameter.name: gemFlagsDirectory
parameter.description: directory to leave some flags for already installed gems.

parameter.name: gemHome
parameter.description: directory of gem home to use when forking JRuby.

parameter.name: gemPath
parameter.description: directory of JRuby path to use when forking JRuby.

parameter.name: jrubyHome
parameter.description: directory of JRuby home to use when forking JRuby.

parameter.name: jrubyLaunchMemory
parameter.description: The amount of memory to use when forking JRuby.

parameter.name: jrubyVersion
parameter.description: if the pom.xml has no runtime dependency to a jruby-complete.jar then this version is used to resolve the jruby-complete dependency from the local/remote maven repository. defaults to "1.4.0".

parameter.name: launchDirectory
parameter.description: the launch directory for the JRuby execution.

parameter.name: localRepository
parameter.description: local repository for internal use.

parameter.name: outputDirectory
parameter.description: output directory for internal use.

parameter.name: outputFile
parameter.description: output file where the stdout will be redirected to

parameter.name: project
parameter.description: reference to maven project for internal use.

parameter.name: remoteRepositories
parameter.description: list of remote repositories for internal use.

parameter.name: verbose
parameter.description: verbose jruby relatred output

mojo.description:
Display help information on rails2-maven-plugin.
Call 
  mvn rails2:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name>
to display parameter details.

parameter.name: detail
parameter.description: If true, display all settable properties for each goal.

parameter.name: goal
parameter.description: The name of the goal for which to show help. If unspecified, all goals will be displayed.

parameter.name: indentSize
parameter.description: The number of spaces per indentation level, should be positive.

parameter.name: lineLength
parameter.description: The maximum length of a display line, should be positive.
